title: Welcome
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian restaurant next to the tram stop and a few metres from the French border behind the river, in a village near Saarbruecken. The house is decorated in Indian style and offer plenty of seating. Printed menu also is in English. Vegans could get mulligatawny (lentil soup), mix pakora, samosa. onion bhaji, mix-platte (starters, ask for vegan ones). The vegetable biryani and several dishes from the vegetarian section are vegan suitable, but just specify to be sure. The only bread without dairy is the roti (flat bread with wholemeal flour), and for dessert mango creme.
